org.upmc.electisim

Class SimulationProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.upmc.electisim.SimulationProfile

  • public class SimulationProfile
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to aggregate the necessary information about the simulation, thus creating a profile. It regroups the preferences type, the voting rule, the agent strategy, the agent list, the candidate list and finally the desired committee size. This class has no real functionality. This is an immutable type.
